answers.answer: Can I ask why you have a csec scheduled?

If they go away or lessen with rest and fluids they could be just Braxton hicks. Or due to dehydration and or stress. As long as they aren't regular and baby's fluid levels are good they will keep your original csection date. I'm on my 4th csection lol 10 days left for me

I have had to c sections before so this will b one too.. n I know what braxton hicks feel like this is worse n different with bh I feel my stomach tightening but now its like bas period cramps n feeling like I need to poop.

u can go in and get checked ive been having the same thing but im only 1 centimeter so they just send me home. I know it suks but they wont move up the date unless its an emergency especially now that they don't consider u full term till 39 weeks.

Ya that's what Dr told me last appointment about being 39 weeks now... But I have a Dr appt Monday I should just try n deal wit the pain and see what they say then but this Will be my 3 rd c section.. thanks

I would try taking a hot bath and if they stay consistent and don't go away after that then just go to l&d and see what they say. It doesn't hurt to get checked out and the worst they can do is just send you home but you never know if the contractions are strong, consistent and causing you to dilate they may just decide to keep you.! Good luck. :)

I hate it lol 39 weeks is so long im having mine at 38 but theyre only letting me because I have gestational diabetes. Take 2 extra strength Tylenols thatll make u more comfortable at least. Just remember if they get to be too much go in and get checked. I see my dr on Tuesday so we'll see how it goes
Ya I am going to take aspirin n see how that helps thank u so much everyone u guys were very helpful

question: So yesterday I was having contractions from around 3 pm til about 10 pm. I called the Dr n he said try n rest n drink fluids so I did and I felt better but I am having them again now n they are uncomfortable. So where I'm confused is I'. 37+6 I have a scheduled c section February 17th am I supposed to bear with the contractions til then ?
title: what should i do?
